SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Explore the latest and greatest innovations
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TE: Discover What Our Users Are Saying
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Real experiences from people who've found their next favorite product
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a game-changer! I've discovered so many unique products I never knew I needed. It's like having a personal shopper in my pocket.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a busy professional, I don't have time to browse stores. This app curates amazing products tailored to my taste. It's efficient and fun!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love how this app introduces me to eco-friendly and sustainable products. It's helped me make more conscious purchasing decisions.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Explore a world of innovative items tailored to your interests
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Tell us what you're looking for, and we'll help you find it!
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: True wireless earbuds with noise cancellation
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Compact solar panel for on-the-go charging
CTA_BODY: Explore a world of innovative and exciting products tailored to your interests. Our app makes finding new must-have items easier than ever.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the product discovery app work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to suggest new and exciting products tailored to your interests. Simply create a profile, indicate your likes, and start exploring a curated selection of innovative items.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, the basic version of our app is completely free to use. We also offer a premium subscription with additional features for users who want an enhanced product discovery experience.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I purchase products directly through the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: While our app focuses on product discovery, we provide direct links to trusted retailers where you can purchase the items you're interested in. We ensure a seamless transition from discovery to purchase.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How often are new products added to the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We update our product database daily, ensuring that you always have access to the latest and most innovative items on the market. Our team of curators works tirelessly to bring you fresh and exciting discoveries.
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Discover the Latest Innovations in Your Inbox
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our product discovery app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the app help me find new products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to curate a personalized selection of new and exciting products tailored to your interests and shopping habits.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, our app is completely free to download and use. We may offer premium features in the future, but our core product discovery service will always remain free.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How often are new products added to the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We update our product database daily, ensuring that you always have access to the latest and most innovative items on the market.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I purchase products directly through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: While we don't handle transactions directly, our app provides quick links to trusted retailers where you can easily purchase the products you discover.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How does the app learn my preferences?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: The app learns your preferences through your browsing history, likes, and saved items. The more you use the app, the better it becomes at recommending products you'll love.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Explore, Compare, and Find Amazing New Items
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of the latest and most popular products across various categories.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Get tailored product suggestions based on your interests, browsing history, and preferences for a truly customized shopping experience.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Be the first to know about upcoming product releases and gain exclusive access to pre-launch offers and limited editions.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Make informed decisions with genuine user reviews, ratings, and insights from our active community of product enthusiasts.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Never miss a deal on your favorite products. Set up alerts and get notified instantly when prices drop on items you're watching.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Easily compare features, prices, and user feedback across multiple products to find the perfect match for your needs and budget.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover the Latest and Greatest Products!
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Explore a world of cutting-edge products, curated just for you. Stay ahead of the curve and find your next must-have item with our intuitive discovery platform.
